question.prompt: What is the principal (chief) question or concern you have regarding your current condition?
In your own words, please provide a brief narrative of the details of the problem for which you are requesting a second opinion:
What is your occupation?
Do you have a family history of back and / or neck problems?
Do you have a history of any of the following? (choose all that apply)
Have you had neck or back problems?
If you have had neck or back problems, what was the cause of your previous neck / back trouble?
If other, please describe:
Are you disabled?
If you are disabled, is your disability due to this problem?
If you are disabled, when did you become disabled?
Do you now or have you ever had a Worker's Compensation claim involving this problem?
Do you have litigation (lawsuit) pending involving this problem?
Have you had previous spine surgery?
If you have had previous spine surgery, please provide the following information:
Approximately how many hours do you sleep at night?
Are you experiencing back pain?
If you are experiencing back pain, which of the following describe your back pain? (choose all that apply)
If other, please describe:
How would you describe the onset (when the pain first started) of your back pain?
Are you experiencing neck pain?
If you are experiencing neck pain, which of the following describe your neck pain? (choose all that apply)
If other, please describe:
How would you describe the onset (when the pain first started) of your neck pain?
How long have you had this problem?
Is the problem?
Do you think the fault of your current neck/back condition is?
Since the onset of your neck pain, have you experienced any of the following symptoms?
Please indicate if you are:
Do you have arm discomfort / pain?
If you do have arm discomfort / pain, please indicate the location below: (choose all that apply)
Which of the following best describe your arm discomfort/pain? (choose all that apply)
Describe below where the arm pain starts and ends. Please be specific for each arm, for example: 'It starts in my left index finger and ends at my left elbow.'
Do you have numbness or tingling in your arm(s), hand(s)?
If you do have numbness or tingling in your arm(s), hand(s), which of the following best describes your numbness/tingling?
Describe below where the tingling and / or numbness is located. Please be specific for both arms, for example: 'I have numbness in the fingers of my left hand and tingling up to my left elbow.'
Do you have hand discomfort / pain?
If you do have hand discomfort / pain, please indicate the location below: (Choose all that apply)
Are your arm symptoms worsened by the movement of your head?
Are your arm symptoms worsened by the movement of your shoulders?
Which areas of your body have the worse pain?
Do you have mid-back pain?
If you do have mid-back pain, please indicate below if the pain radiates (moves to) any of the areas below: (choose all that apply)
Do you have weakness in your arms?
If you do have weakness in your arms, where does the weakness occur?
If both arms are affected, please give detail below:
Do you have difficulty completing daily tasks due to the weakness?
If you have difficulty completing daily tasks due to the weakness, please describe:
Do you have difficulty walking?
If you do have difficulty walking, please describe the difficulty:
Do you use any of the following assistive devices?
If you use any of the following assistive devices, please indicate below: (choose all that apply)
If you use any assistive devices, when did you start using the assistive device?
Do you have difficulty doing activities that require fine motor coordination skills, such as: buttoning your shirt, tying your shoes, writing, etc.?
If you have difficulty doing activities that require fine motor coordination skills, please describe:
Please indicate which of the following activities increase your pain: (choose all that apply)
If other, please indicate:
Please indicate which of the following activities decrease your pain: (choose all that apply)
If other, please indicate:
Do you have problems passing your urine?
If you have problems passing your urine, has it developed since the onset of your pain problem?
Do you have problems with constipation?
If you have problems with constipation, has it developed since the onset of your pain problem?
Do you have problems with diarrhea?
If you have problems with diarrhea, has it developed since the onset of your pain problem?
Previous treatment: Which of the following types of treatment have you had for your neck/back pain?
What was the effect of the treatment?
How long did the relief continue?
What was the effect of the treatment?
How long did the relief continue?
What was the effect of the treatment?
How long did the relief continue?
What was the effect of the treatment?
How long did the relief continue?
What was the effect of the treatment?
How long did the relief continue?
What was the effect of the treatment?
How long did the relief continue?
What was the effect of the treatment?
How long did the relief continue?
What was the effect of the treatment?
How long did the relief continue?
What was the effect of the treatment?
How long did the relief continue?
What was the effect of the treatment?
How long did the relief continue?
What was the effect of the treatment?
How long did the relief continue?
What was the effect of the treatment?
How long did the relief continue?
What was the effect of the treatment?
How long did the relief continue?
What was the effect of the treatment?
How long did the relief continue?
What was the effect of the treatment?
How long did the relief continue?
What was the effect of the treatment?
How long did the relief continue?
Indicate type of treatment and the effect of the treatment?
Have you been treated with NSAIDs (non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs)?
If you have been treated with NSAIDs, please provide the following information regarding your past use of NSAIDs: (choose all that apply)
What was the effect of the treatment?
What was the effect of the treatment?
What was the effect of the treatment?
What was the effect of the treatment?
What was the effect of the treatment?
What was the effect of the treatment?
What was the effect of the treatment?
What was the effect of the treatment?
If other, please list and describe the effect of the treatment:
Have you been treated with muscle relaxants?
If you have been treated with muscle relaxants, please provide the following information regarding your past use of muscle relaxants: (choose all that apply)
What was the effect of the treatment?
What was the effect of the treatment?
What was the effect of the treatment?
What was the effect of the treatment?
If other, please list and describe the effect of the treatment:
Have you been treated with pain relievers?
If you have been treated with pain relievers, please provide the following information regarding your past use of pain relievers: (choose all that apply)
What was the effect of the treatment?
What was the effect of the treatment?
What was the effect of the treatment?
What was the effect of the treatment?
What was the effect of the treatment?
If other, please list and describe the effect of the treatment:
Have you been treated with corticosteroids?
If you have been treated with corticosteriods, please provide the following information regarding your past use of corticosteriods: (choose all that apply)
What was the effect of the treatment?
What was the effect of the treatment?
If other, please list and describe the effect of the treatment:
Have you been treated with anti-seizure medications?
If you have been treated with anti-seizure medications, please provide the following information regarding your past use of anti-seizure medications: (choose all that apply)
What was the effect of the treatment?
If other, please list and describe the effect of the treatment:
Have you been treated with anti-depressants?
If you have been treated with anti-depressants, please provide the following information regarding your past use of anti-depressants: (choose all that apply)
What was the effect of the treatment?
What was the effect of the treatment?
What was the effect of the treatment?
What was the effect of the treatment?
What was the effect of the treatment?
What was the effect of the treatment?
What was the effect of the treatment?
If other, please list and describe the effect of the treatment:
Are you wearing a neck brace?
If you are wearing a neck brace, provide the following information:
Please list all diagnostic tests (imaging studies) you have undergone. For each study, please provide date and location:
Were you recommended to have surgery for this problem?
If you were recommended to have surgery for this problem, please provide the following information:
Is there anything else you think would be helpful regarding your condition?
